module.name: gadwordstracking
module.description: Implement Google Adwords' Conversion Tracking tool, and make sure your orders / conversions get correctly sent to Google Adwords, so you can have a clear view on campaigns' profitability
module.author: Business Tech
module.confirmUninstall: Are you sure you want to remove it ? Your Google Adwords Conversion Tracking will no longer work. Be careful, all your configuration and your data will be lost
